title: Looking for an adc! ;D

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
I'm **silver 5** on the oce servers and am looking for an adc to sup. I main **Leona**, but am proficient in **Nami** and **thresh**, I can fill all roles. Preferably someone who isn't a dick but if you can get the job done i don't care what you say about me.

{{champion:89}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:412}}

replies.body: Currently silver 2 - Main adc. Mains are - Graves , Ezreal and cait.
ADC main here. currently doing smurf games with another leona main. something like 8-2 with cait. and 1-0 MF. but i can do others.

So which is your main and what is your smurf?
Links to profiles?

this is my main...

just did my promos on smurf....lost both cos of epic %%%%%%s and feeders...
the only games i have lost outside of placements...15-3 is SO SAD.
Hey I have been playing add for a while now and looking for a sup I play vayne, Lucian and sometimes jinx ign: Basicbeastboy
im currently unranked but last season I was silver 3-4
1-3 games a night and a lot on the weekend
yeah sure man, Up for one now?
In a hour soz but Add me and I'll accept when on :D
What rank were you last season?
But I plan on pushing for gold this season

Well which one was it? You're either 3 or 4...
On what account, cause your profile says you were unranked last season.
I was 3 then 4 and it might have been preseason
